languages.text: "И несущие утешение госпитальерки, и многомудрые сестры диалогус знают, как встречать врагов Человечества. "Диалог", что они ведут с еретиками, обычно короток, и последнее слово в нем — залп болтера!"

"Both the solace-bringing Sisters Hospitaller and the enlightened Sisters Dialogus know how to greet enemies of Humanity. Their 'dialogue' with heretics is usually quite short, with the last word being a bolter discharge!"
languages.original_text: "И несущие утешение госпитальерки, и многомудрые сестры диалогус знают, как встречать врагов Человечества. "Диалог", что они ведут с еретиками, обычно короток, и последнее слово в нем — залп болтера!"

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Both the solace-bringing Sisters Hospitaller and the enlightened Sisters Dialogus know how to greet enemies of Humanity. Their 'dialogue' with heretics is usually quite short, with the last word being a bolter discharge!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “无论是带来慰藉的医护修女，还是负责教化的书记修女，都知道该如何对付人类之敌。她们与异端分子之间的‘对话’往往非常简短，而且最后一个字一定会是爆矢枪的炮火！”
languages.original_text: "Both the solace-bringing Sisters Hospitaller and the enlightened Sisters Dialogus know how to greet enemies of Humanity. Their 'dialogue' with heretics is usually quite short, with the last word being a bolter discharge!"

traits.locale_text: “无论是带来慰藉的医护修女，还是负责教化的书记修女，都知道该如何对付人类之敌。她们与异端分子之间的‘对话’往往非常简短，而且最后一个字一定会是爆矢枪的炮火！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Both the solace-bringing Sisters Hospitaller and the enlightened Sisters Dialogus know how to greet enemies of Humanity. Their 'dialogue' with heretics is usually quite short, with the last word being a bolter discharge!"

languages.text: «Tanto las hermanas Hospitalarias, portadoras del solaz, como las ilustres hermanas Dialogus saben cómo recibir a los enemigos de la Humanidad. ¡Sus "diálogos" con los herejes suelen ser bien breves y terminar con un disparo de bólter!».
languages.original_text: "Both the solace-bringing Sisters Hospitaller and the enlightened Sisters Dialogus know how to greet enemies of Humanity. Their 'dialogue' with heretics is usually quite short, with the last word being a bolter discharge!"

traits.locale_text: «Tanto las hermanas Hospitalarias, portadoras del solaz, como las ilustres hermanas Dialogus saben cómo recibir a los enemigos de la Humanidad. ¡Sus "diálogos" con los herejes suelen ser bien breves y terminar con un disparo de bólter Both the solace-bringing Sisters Hospitaller and the enlightened!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「慰撫を務めとする医療修道女も、啓蒙を主とする通詞修道女も、人類の敵に対応する方法は心得ている。異端者たちとの『対話』は通常、非常に短いものとなる。そして、その最後の言葉はボルターをもって放つこととなるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Both the solace-bringing Sisters Hospitaller and the enlightened Sisters Dialogus know how to greet enemies of Humanity. Their 'dialogue' with heretics is usually quite short, with the last word being a bolter discharge!"

traits.locale_text: 「慰撫を務めとする医療修道女も、啓蒙を主とする通詞修道女も、人類の敵に対応する方法は心得ている。異端者たちとの『対話』は通常、非常に短いものとなる。そして、その最後の言葉はボルターをもって放つこととなるのだ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Sowohl die trostspenden Hospitalis als auch die erleuchteten Dialogus wissen, wie man Feinde der Menschheit zu begrüßen hat. Ihr 'Dialog' mit Ketzern ist meist kurz und das letzte Wort besteht aus einer Bolter-Entladung!"
languages.original_text: "Both the solace-bringing Sisters Hospitaller and the enlightened Sisters Dialogus know how to greet enemies of Humanity. Their 'dialogue' with heretics is usually quite short, with the last word being a bolter discharge!"

traits.locale_text: "Sowohl die trostspenden Hospitalis als auch die erleuchteten Dialogus wissen, wie man Feinde der Menschheit zu begrüßen hat. Ihr 'Dialog' mit Ketzern ist meist kurz und das letzte Wort besteht aus einer Bolter-Entladung!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Les réconfortantes Sœurs Hospitalières et les très éclairées Sœurs Dialogus savent bien comment traiter avec les ennemis de l'humanité, elles aussi. Leurs dialogues avec les hérétiques sont généralement très courts, et ponctués d'une décharge de bolter ! »
languages.original_text: "Both the solace-bringing Sisters Hospitaller and the enlightened Sisters Dialogus know how to greet enemies of Humanity. Their 'dialogue' with heretics is usually quite short, with the last word being a bolter discharge!"

traits.locale_text: « Les réconfortantes Sœurs Hospitalières et les très éclairées Sœurs Dialogus savent bien comment traiter avec les ennemis de l'humanité, elles aussi. Leurs dialogues avec les hérétiques sont généralement très courts, et ponctués d'une décharge de bolter ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Şefkatli Hospitalye Rahibeleri ve münevver Diyalog Rahibeleri, İnsanlık düşmanlarının nasıl karşılanacağını iyi bilir. Kâfirlerle 'diyalogları' genelde hayli kısa sürer, son sözü de bulonatar söyler!"
languages.original_text: "Both the solace-bringing Sisters Hospitaller and the enlightened Sisters Dialogus know how to greet enemies of Humanity. Their 'dialogue' with heretics is usually quite short, with the last word being a bolter discharge!"

traits.locale_text: "Şefkatli Hospitalye Rahibeleri ve münevver Diyalog Rahibeleri, İnsanlık düşmanlarının nasıl karşılanacağını iyi bilir. Kâfirlerle 'diyalogları' genelde hayli kısa sürer, son sözü de bulonatar söyler!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
